column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Should you ever decide to return
column2: ask for me and I will be glad to prepare you a bowl of ramen suitable to your taste preference.  Granted
column3: it won't be the little packets of noodles you are normally used to
column4: but I'll create something that will definitely be to your liking.  The uniqueness of Japanese ramen is the many different varieties in broths
column5: noodles and toppings that can be put together to create something that will suit every palate.  Broths can be mixed in different portions to create the perfect balance of taste and thickness.  I'm in the restaurant quite often so if you do come back
column6: please ask for me.  I would love to create or help you find something to your liking.
